name: v0.6.0 - Campaign Wizard & Contact Management Redesign
body:
## Highlights

This release introduces a comprehensive **Campaign Creation Wizard** and a completely redesigned **Contact Management** experience with DISC profiling support.

## New Features

### Campaign Creation Wizard
- Multi-step wizard with 3-step flow: Basic Info → Scheduling → Compliance
- **Audience Selector** with tag-based filtering and file upload support
- **Template Preview** for voice, email, and WhatsApp channels
- **Schedule Preview** with calendar visualization
- **Auto-save** drafts with recovery banner
- **Import Campaign** dialog for duplicating existing campaigns
- Anti-harassment compliance settings with reviewer assignment
- Backend services: `AudienceService`, `ComplianceService`
- Database migrations for enhanced campaigns and compliance tracking

### Contact Management Redesign
- **Grid View** with contact cards showing key metrics
- **Compact Stats Bar** for quick overview
- **DISC Profiling** integration for personality insights
- Improved search and filtering

### Agent Skills Open Standard
- Implements [Agent Skills](https://agentskills.io) specification
- SKILL.md format with YAML frontmatter + Markdown body
- Validation tooling: `bun run skills:validate`
- Full specification compliance with `allowed-tools` support

### MCP Server
- Standalone MCP server with comprehensive tool coverage
- Complete CRUD operations for agents, customers, conversations
- Knowledge base search and document management
- Analytics and feedback tools
- PII detection and redaction

## UI/UX Improvements

- **Animated Tab Indicators** in AgentBuilder
- **Motion Animations** across Campaigns, Workflows, and UI primitives
- **Emotion-aware SynapticLogo** in GlobalAIAgent
- **Collapsible Chat Widget** with 3-state animation system
- **PromptEditor** improvements and fixes
- Fixed border styling issues across components

## Bug Fixes

- Fix GlobalAIAgent message styling and Settings nav consistency
- Fix PATCH endpoint middleware for agents
- Fix collapsed mode in sidebar
- Fix border styling in Agent builder Skills tab

## Technical Changes

- Enhanced `CampaignDO` with status management and filtering
- New routes: `campaign-audience.ts` for audience management
- Connection status banner with `useConnectionStatus` hook
- Updated dependencies

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keyreply/kira-cloudflare/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0
